mark_performances.question: Identify each performance
mark_performances.guidance: Alongside the main performance, the playbills often contain details of additional performances. a rectangle should be drawn around each. Any notes about upcoming or past performances can be ignored.

transcribe_places_titles_dates.question: Transcribe the location of the performance
transcribe_places_titles_dates.guidance: Transcribe the location of the highlighted performance (e.g. the name of the theatre).

transcribe_places_titles_dates.question: Transcribe the title
transcribe_places_titles_dates.guidance: Transcribe the title of the highlighted performance.

transcribe_places_titles_dates.question: Enter the date
transcribe_places_titles_dates.guidance: Enter the date of the highlighted performance (if present).

mark_actors.question: Identify each actor and role
mark_actors.guidance: Draw a rectangle around each actor (the same rectangle should also encapsulate any the associated role, if present).

transcribe_actors.question: Transcribe the name of the actor
transcribe_actors.guidance: Transcribe the name of the highlighted actor (and role, if present).
